plot: Randy is outraged when Stan and the other boys start a boy band.

Cartman decides to realize his dream of getting rich by starting up a boy band called Fingerbang. The band, consisting of the four boys and Wendy (dressed as a boy), sets out to produce a video and get a performance gig at the local mall. Meanwhile, Stan's father has a fit when he hears about Stan joining a boy band, revealing a painful secret about his own past.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
